synopsis.text: Rin, Haru, Makoto, Nagisa, and Rei, the inseparable swimming enthusiasts, reunite for another season of camaraderie and competition. As they enter their third year, the Iwatobi Swim Club faces the challenge of recruiting new members to prevent its dissolution. Haru and Makoto, now seniors, grapple with the daunting task of deciding their future plans, putting their passion for swimming to the test. Meanwhile, Rin, the new captain of Samezuka Academy Swim Club, is determined to fulfill his dream of becoming a professional swimmer. However, the arrival of an old childhood friend, Sousuke, stirs up tension among Rin, Haru, and Sousuke. As the summer unfolds, the group of friends will encounter new rivals, face personal challenges, and strengthen their unbreakable bond. Will the Iwatobi Swim Club emerge stronger than ever, or will they succumb to the mounting pressure?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
